preqs: No formal background in astronomy or astrophysics is required.
proh: ASP1010 can only be completed prior to ASP2011 and ASP2062
description: This unit focuses on concepts that will allow students to gain understanding of key astrophysical phenomena. The topics covered include the night sky, the historical development of astronomical knowledge, our solar system, comets and asteroids, the sun, exoplanets, other stars, stellar remnants such as black holes, the Milky Way, other galaxies, quasars, dark matter, and cosmology in general.
